description.Резолуција: (1920x1200) WUXGA IPS 300nits Glossy, 100% sRGB, Dolby® Vision™, TÜV Low Blue Light, Touch
description.Аудио: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
description.Звучник: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Dolby® Atmos®
description.Порти: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Always On), 2x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 1 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0 and DisplayPort™ 1.4), 1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 4K/60Hz, 1x microSD card reader, 1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm), Power Adapter - 45W USB-C® (3-pin)
